title: Permatex Fast Orange 25217 Pumice Lotion, Heavy Duty Hand Cleaner, Natural Citrus Scent, Waterless Cleaner For Mechanics, Strong Grease Fighter, 1/2 Gallon
description: Permatex Fast Orange Pumice Lotion Hand Cleaner is fortified with aloe, lanolin, glycerin, and other skin conditioners, to gently clean the toughest dirt. The biodegradable, waterless, petroleum solvent-free formula contains no harsh chemicals, mineral oils or ammonia that can sting cuts and abrasions. Pure, fresh-smelling, natural citrus power cleans deep down to remove even the most stubborn grease and grime. Removes resins, oil, grease, tar, grime, soil, printers’ ink, epoxies, paint, rubber cement, gasket and tile cements. Also works great on laundry stains, scuff marks, tile floors, pet odors and many other household cleaning needs.
